[27-May-2025 11:51:30 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

UPDATE wp_ha_resourcemanager_bookings AS t JOIN ( SELECT resource_id, `from`, LOWER(CONCAT( SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 1, 8), '-', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 9, 4), '-', '4', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 14, 3), '-', 'a', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 17, 3), '-', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 21, 12) )) AS uuid FROM wp_ha_resourcemanager_bookings AS u GROUP BY resource_id, `from` ) AS u ON t.resource_id = u.resource_id AND t.`from` = u.`from` SET t.uid = u.uuid WHERE t.uid = ''
